data.title: How Travis Barker's Ex-Wife Shanna Moakler Got In The Way Of A Romance Between Himself And Kim Karda
data.meta_description: Highlights   Kourtney and Kim Kardashian's feud continues on their new display, with Kourtney accusing Kim of using her marriage ceremony as a "business opportunity."   The tension between the sisters began on their earlier display, the place they got bodily after Kourtney neglected a circle of relatives photoshoot due to mom duties.   Travis Barker, who previously had a crush on Kim, has no longer publicly commented on the sisters' feud, focusing instead on his family after his spouse underwent emergency fetal surgery.
data.text:
Publish date: 2024-04-25

Highlights

Kourtney and Kim Kardashian's feud continues on their new display, with Kourtney accusing Kim of using her marriage ceremony as a "business opportunity."

The tension between the sisters began on their earlier display, the place they got bodily after Kourtney neglected a circle of relatives photoshoot due to mom duties.

Travis Barker, who previously had a crush on Kim, has no longer publicly commented on the sisters' feud, focusing instead on his family after his spouse underwent emergency fetal surgery.

Kourtney Kardashian's courting along with her more youthful sister, Kim Kardashian has been rocky over the past few years. The two appear to have opposing perspectives in terms of paintings.

It began on their E! display, Keeping Up With the Kardashians the place they famously got bodily with every different after Kourtney ignored a circle of relatives photoshoot Kim had squeezed into her busy schedule. The eldest Kardashian sister explained that she had mom duties to prioritize at the moment.

Kim then categorised the Poosh "fraudster" the "least exciting to look at," which sparked outrage amongst lovers who concept the Skims "briber" was over-promoting hustle culture.

The rigidity just lately carried onto their new Hulu display, The Kardashians where Kourtney accused Kim of the use of her Dolce & Gabbana wedding in Italy as a "business opportunity." Now, fanatics are questioning what Travis Barker feels about the feud since the Blink-182 drummer previously admitted to having a weigh down on Kim.

Related

Kim Cattrall Has Brutally Honest Answer About What Working With Kim Kardashian On SKIMS Ad Was Like

The 'Sex and the City' alum didn't hold again when asked about her influence of Kardashian after modeling for her brand SKIMS.

Are Kim And Kourtney Kardashian Still Feuding?

As of the present season 4 of their reality show, Kim and Kourtney are still going at it. In the earlier season, the latter distanced herself from the family, announcing: "With my family, I'm like, 'Protect my energy.' And like, 'I'm married! Bye everyone!'"

Prior to that, she broke down all the way through a conversation with Kendall Jenner. "I feel like there's an abundance of opportunities," she mentioned of Kim's "copied" Dolce & Gabbana assortment. "It's not about business, it's just there's so much and it takes precedence over hurting your sister. It's legit copying my wedding."

Kendall stated that she may just see "both sides" of the scenario after Kourtney stated that what Kim did "was more personal. I think that's why it hurts my feelings because it was my actual wedding." Kim's catty response went viral with other folks calling it a first-world drawback.

"I got married in Italy. Am I saying you copied me by getting married in Italy?" she mentioned in a confessional interview. "Who performed at my wedding? Andrea Bocelli. Who performed at Kourtney's wedding? Andrea Bocelli. You stole my f--king wedding country and my wedding performer. Andrea Bocelli is my favorite male singer of all time, but I'm copying her dolce vita lifestyle? OK."

The two are on just right phrases for now after a serious one-on-one communicate. But in a recent episode, Kim admitted that they had a staff chat referred to as "Not Kourtney." When requested about the individuals of the staff, Kourtney mentioned in her Instagram feedback: "I believe it was just my sisters from the surveys I've been taking."

Related

Now That She Has An "In" With Disney, Will Kim Kardashian Work With Marvel?

Kim Kardashian's acting in American Horror Story is drawing attention, however may it lead to large opportunities with Disney's Marvel?

In an episode of The Kardashians, Kris Jenner told Kourtney that the musician moved to Calabasas to be with reference to her. Fans then reminded the internet that Travis dated Kim in 2007, the year he moved to the neighborhood. He even referred to as the former Mrs. Kanye West "f------ hot" and "eye candy" after saying he had a huge "crush" on her.

In his 2016 memoir, Can I Say: Living Large, Cheating Death, and Drums, Drums, Drums, Travis wrote that during a 2006 go back and forth to Amsterdam along with his then-girlfriend, Paris Hilton, he was secretly eyeing Kim who was working as the socialite's closet organizer back then.

"I was having a blast and was happy to let the world know it. I kept on secretly checking out Kim, telling Lil Chris [drum tech], 'I don't care if she's the closet girl, she's hot,'" he wrote in the ebook. They then started speaking after Kim's notorious intercourse tape.

Travis recalled being a "gentleman" to her in spite of her recognition at that time. "I'd go visit her and her family at their clothing store," he said of their healthy affair. "We'd be really sweet around each other, like little kids, and then when we were apart, she'd call me and say, 'I want to see you again.' 'Me too,' I'd say."

However, he in the end got again with his ex-wife Shanna Moakler who "caught wind of what was going on. She poured a drink on Kim at a party thrown by Carmen Electra. I felt terrible," stated the punk rocker. Travis then clarified that he and Kim "never touched each other. It just wasn't meant to be."

Related

Khloe Kardashian Says Scott Disick Hit Rock Bottom As Kourtney Prepares To Welcome Baby With Travis Barker

Not handiest is Scott Disick still struggling with Kourtney Kardashian shifting on, however he used to be lately in a serious automotive coincidence.

What Does Travis Barker Think About Kim And Kourtney's Feud?

Travis hasn't made any public statement on Kim and Koutney's feud. But the couple appear to be desirous about their very own circle of relatives this present day. In September 2023, the drummer postponed his excursion as his spouse had an emergency fetal surgery. In a lengthy Instagram publish, Kourtney introduced that everything went smartly with the operation.

"I will be forever grateful to my incredible doctors for saving our baby's life," she wrote back then. "I am eternally grateful to my husband who rushed to my side from tour to be with me in the hospital and take care of me afterwards, my rock. And to my mom, thank you for holding my hand through this."

She persevered: "I don't think anyone who hasn't been through a similar situation can begin to understand that feeling of fear. I have a whole new understanding and respect for the mamas who have had to fight for their babies while pregnant. Praise be to God. Walking out of the hospital with my baby boy in my tummy and safe was the truest blessing."
